name: robin
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small, brown European bird with a red front, or a similar but slightly larger brown bird of North America: Robins mostly appear in the winter and are commonly pictured on Christmas cards.
Arterra/Contributor/ Universal Images Group/GettyImages
